name: Lexiblox
summary:
The wonderful words of Lexiblox don't come up much in other word games, and the 35 handcrafted levels never repeat a word.
Lexiblox is a unique indie word game. Focus on finding the only word that the Lexiblox can spell. It's full of everyday words, but ones with interesting patterns you will enjoy puzzling over. It's as easy to use as a childhood toy, and you will enjoy focused, relaxed concentration as you solve the hundreds of available puzzles.
